issue.title: [Dev] Update URLs in the repo to point to main
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15696](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15696). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This should happen after INFRA makes the switch. It's not urgent for github URLs because github will automatically redirect.
